Sql.query: delete from dpo_datos96 where dpodatsubcodi in ({2}) and dpodatfecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY')

select dpodatsubcodi, dpodattnfcodi, dpodattnfserie, dpodatbarcodi, dpodattipocodi, dpodatfecha from dpo_datos96 where dpodatsubcodi in ({2}) and dpodatfecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY')

select tab1.dpodattnfcodi, tab2.tnfbarbarcodi, tab1.dpodatfecha, H1 + H2 + H3 + H4 + H5 + H6 + H7 + H8 + H9 +H10 + H11 + H12 + H13 + H14 + H15 + H16 + H17 + H18 + H19 +H20 + H21 + H22 + H23 + H24 + H25 + H26 + H27 + H28 + H29 +H30 + H31 + H32 + H33 + H34 + H35 + H36 + H37 + H38 + H39 +H40 + H41 + H42 + H43 + H44 + H45 + H46 + H47 + H48 + H49 +H50 + H51 + H52 + H53 + H54 + H55 + H56 + H57 + H58 + H59 +H60 + H61 + H62 + H63 + H64 + H65 + H66 + H67 + H68 + H69 +H70 + H71 + H72 + H73 + H74 + H75 + H76 + H77 + H78 + H79 +H80 + H81 + H82 + H83 + H84 + H85 + H86 + H87 + H88 + H89 +H90 + H91 + H92 + H93 + H94 + H95 + H96 as MEDITOTAL, tab1.H1, tab1.H2, tab1.H3, tab1.H4, tab1.H5, tab1.H6, tab1.H7, tab1.H8, tab1.H9, tab1.H10, tab1.H11, tab1.H12, tab1.H13, tab1.H14, tab1.H15, tab1.H16, tab1.H17, tab1.H18, tab1.H19, tab1.H20, tab1.H21, tab1.H22, tab1.H23, tab1.H24, tab1.H25, tab1.H26, tab1.H27, tab1.H28, tab1.H29, tab1.H30, tab1.H31, tab1.H32, tab1.H33, tab1.H34, tab1.H35, tab1.H36, tab1.H37, tab1.H38, tab1.H39, tab1.H40, tab1.H41, tab1.H42, tab1.H43, tab1.H44, tab1.H45, tab1.H46, tab1.H47, tab1.H48, tab1.H49, tab1.H50, tab1.H51, tab1.H52, tab1.H53, tab1.H54, tab1.H55, tab1.H56, tab1.H57, tab1.H58, tab1.H59, tab1.H60, tab1.H61, tab1.H62, tab1.H63, tab1.H64, tab1.H65, tab1.H66, tab1.H67, tab1.H68, tab1.H69, tab1.H70, tab1.H71, tab1.H72, tab1.H73, tab1.H74, tab1.H75, tab1.H76, tab1.H77, tab1.H78, tab1.H79, tab1.H80, tab1.H81, tab1.H82, tab1.H83, tab1.H84, tab1.H85, tab1.H86, tab1.H87, tab1.H88, tab1.H89, tab1.H90, tab1.H91, tab1.H92, tab1.H93, tab1.H94, tab1.H95, tab1.H96 from dpo_datos96 tab1 inner join dpo_trafobarra tab2 on tab1.Dpodattnfcodi = tab2.Tnfbartnfcodi AND tab1.Dpodatbarcodi = tab2.Tnfbarbarcodi where tab2.tnfbarcodi in ({0}) and tab1.dpodatfecha between to_date('{1}','dd/MM/yyyy') and to_date('{2}','dd/MM/yyyy') and dpodattipocodi = {3}

select dpodatfecha, SUM(H1) AS H1,SUM(H2) AS H2,SUM(H3) AS H3,SUM(H4) AS H4,SUM(H5) AS H5, SUM(H6) AS H6,SUM(H7) AS H7,SUM(H8) AS H8,SUM(H9) AS H9,SUM(H10) AS H10, SUM(H11) AS H11,SUM(H12) AS H12,SUM(H13) AS H13,SUM(H14) AS H14,SUM(H15) AS H15, SUM(H16) AS H16,SUM(H17) AS H17,SUM(H18) AS H18,SUM(H19) AS H19,SUM(H20) AS H20, SUM(H21) AS H21,SUM(H22) AS H22,SUM(H23) AS H23,SUM(H24) AS H24,SUM(H25) AS H25, SUM(H26) AS H26,SUM(H27) AS H27,SUM(H28) AS H28,SUM(H29) AS H29,SUM(H30) AS H30, SUM(H31) AS H31,SUM(H32) AS H32,SUM(H33) AS H33,SUM(H34) AS H34,SUM(H35) AS H35, SUM(H36) AS H36,SUM(H37) AS H37,SUM(H38) AS H38,SUM(H39) AS H39,SUM(H40) AS H40, SUM(H41) AS H41,SUM(H42) AS H42,SUM(H43) AS H43,SUM(H44) AS H44,SUM(H45) AS H45, SUM(H46) AS H46,SUM(H47) AS H47,SUM(H48) AS H48,SUM(H49) AS H49,SUM(H50) AS H50, SUM(H51) AS H51,SUM(H52) AS H52,SUM(H53) AS H53,SUM(H54) AS H54,SUM(H55) AS H55, SUM(H56) AS H56,SUM(H57) AS H57,SUM(H58) AS H58,SUM(H59) AS H59,SUM(H60) AS H60, SUM(H61) AS H61,SUM(H62) AS H62,SUM(H63) AS H63,SUM(H64) AS H64,SUM(H65) AS H65, SUM(H66) AS H66,SUM(H67) AS H67,SUM(H68) AS H68,SUM(H69) AS H69,SUM(H70) AS H70, SUM(H71) AS H71,SUM(H72) AS H72,SUM(H73) AS H73,SUM(H74) AS H74,SUM(H75) AS H75, SUM(H76) AS H76,SUM(H77) AS H77,SUM(H78) AS H78,SUM(H79) AS H79,SUM(H80) AS H80, SUM(H81) AS H81,SUM(H82) AS H82,SUM(H83) AS H83,SUM(H84) AS H84,SUM(H85) AS H85, SUM(H86) AS H86,SUM(H87) AS H87,SUM(H88) AS H88,SUM(H89) AS H89,SUM(H90) AS H90, SUM(H91) AS H91,SUM(H92) AS H92,SUM(H93) AS H93,SUM(H94) AS H94,SUM(H95) AS H95, SUM(H96) AS H96 from dpo_datos96 tab1 inner join dpo_trafobarra tab2 on tab1.dpodattnfcodi = tab2.tnfbartnfcodi and tab1.dpodatbarcodi = tab2.tnfbarbarcodi where tab2.tnfbarcodi in ({2}) and to_char(tab1.dpodatfecha, 'yyyy') = '{0}' and to_char(tab1.dpodatfecha, 'MM') in ({1}) and tab1.dpodattipocodi in ({3}) group by tab1.dpodatfecha order by tab1.dpodatfecha asc

select tab2.tnfbarcodi, tab1.dpodattnfcodi, tab1.dpodatfecha, tab1.H1, tab1.H2, tab1.H3, tab1.H4, tab1.H5, tab1.H6, tab1.H7, tab1.H8, tab1.H9, tab1.H10, tab1.H11, tab1.H12, tab1.H13, tab1.H14, tab1.H15, tab1.H16, tab1.H17, tab1.H18, tab1.H19, tab1.H20, tab1.H21, tab1.H22, tab1.H23, tab1.H24, tab1.H25, tab1.H26, tab1.H27, tab1.H28, tab1.H29, tab1.H30, tab1.H31, tab1.H32, tab1.H33, tab1.H34, tab1.H35, tab1.H36, tab1.H37, tab1.H38, tab1.H39, tab1.H40, tab1.H41, tab1.H42, tab1.H43, tab1.H44, tab1.H45, tab1.H46, tab1.H47, tab1.H48, tab1.H49, tab1.H50, tab1.H51, tab1.H52, tab1.H53, tab1.H54, tab1.H55, tab1.H56, tab1.H57, tab1.H58, tab1.H59, tab1.H60, tab1.H61, tab1.H62, tab1.H63, tab1.H64, tab1.H65, tab1.H66, tab1.H67, tab1.H68, tab1.H69, tab1.H70, tab1.H71, tab1.H72, tab1.H73, tab1.H74, tab1.H75, tab1.H76, tab1.H77, tab1.H78, tab1.H79, tab1.H80, tab1.H81, tab1.H82, tab1.H83, tab1.H84, tab1.H85, tab1.H86, tab1.H87, tab1.H88, tab1.H89, tab1.H90, tab1.H91, tab1.H92, tab1.H93, tab1.H94, tab1.H95, tab1.H96 from dpo_datos96 tab1 inner join dpo_trafobarra tab2 on tab1.dpodattnfcodi = tab2.tnfbartnfcodi and tab1.dpodatbarcodi = tab2.tnfbarbarcodi where tab2.tnfbarcodi in ({2}) and to_char(tab1.dpodatfecha, 'yyyy') = '{0}' and to_char(tab1.dpodatfecha, 'MM') in ({1}) and tab1.dpodattipocodi in ({3}) order by tab1.dpodatfecha asc

select Dpodatsubcodi,Dpodattnfcodi,Dpodattnfserie,Dpodatbarcodi,Dpodattipocodi,Dpodatfecha, () as Meditotal from dpo_datos96 where dpodatfecha between to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and (dpodatsubcodi = (select dposubcodiexcel from dpo_subestacion where dposubcodi = '{2}') or '{2}' = '0') and (dpodattnfcodi = (select dpotnfcodiexcel from dpo_transformador where dpotnfcodi = '{3}') or '{3}' = '0') and (dpodatbarcodi = (select dpobarcodiexcel from dpo_barra where dpobarcodi = '{4}') or '{4}' = '0') order by dpodatsubcodi, dpodattnfcodi, dpodattnfserie, dpodatbarcodi, dpodattipocodi, dpodatfecha

select tab2.tnfbarcodi, tab1.dpodattnfcodi, tab1.dpodatfecha, tab1.H1, tab1.H2, tab1.H3, tab1.H4, tab1.H5, tab1.H6, tab1.H7, tab1.H8, tab1.H9, tab1.H10, tab1.H11, tab1.H12, tab1.H13, tab1.H14, tab1.H15, tab1.H16, tab1.H17, tab1.H18, tab1.H19, tab1.H20, tab1.H21, tab1.H22, tab1.H23, tab1.H24, tab1.H25, tab1.H26, tab1.H27, tab1.H28, tab1.H29, tab1.H30, tab1.H31, tab1.H32, tab1.H33, tab1.H34, tab1.H35, tab1.H36, tab1.H37, tab1.H38, tab1.H39, tab1.H40, tab1.H41, tab1.H42, tab1.H43, tab1.H44, tab1.H45, tab1.H46, tab1.H47, tab1.H48, tab1.H49, tab1.H50, tab1.H51, tab1.H52, tab1.H53, tab1.H54, tab1.H55, tab1.H56, tab1.H57, tab1.H58, tab1.H59, tab1.H60, tab1.H61, tab1.H62, tab1.H63, tab1.H64, tab1.H65, tab1.H66, tab1.H67, tab1.H68, tab1.H69, tab1.H70, tab1.H71, tab1.H72, tab1.H73, tab1.H74, tab1.H75, tab1.H76, tab1.H77, tab1.H78, tab1.H79, tab1.H80, tab1.H81, tab1.H82, tab1.H83, tab1.H84, tab1.H85, tab1.H86, tab1.H87, tab1.H88, tab1.H89, tab1.H90, tab1.H91, tab1.H92, tab1.H93, tab1.H94, tab1.H95, tab1.H96 from dpo_datos96 tab1 inner join dpo_trafobarra tab2 on tab1.dpodattnfcodi = tab2.tnfbartnfcodi and tab1.dpodatbarcodi = tab2.tnfbarbarcodi where tab2.tnfbarcodi in ({0}) and tab1.dpodatfecha between to_date('{1}', 'dd/MM/yyyy') and to_date('{2}', 'dd/MM/yyyy')
and tab1.dpodattipocodi in ({3}) order by tab1.dpodatfecha asc

select trafo.dpotnfcodi, dat96.dpodatfecha, nvl(sum(h1),0) h1, nvl(sum(h2),0) h2, nvl(sum(h3),0) h3, nvl(sum(h4),0) h4, nvl(sum(h5),0) h5, nvl(sum(h6),0) h6, nvl(sum(h7),0) h7, nvl(sum(h8),0) h8, nvl(sum(h9),0) h9, nvl(sum(h10),0) h10, nvl(sum(h11),0) h11, nvl(sum(h12),0) h12, nvl(sum(h13),0) h13, nvl(sum(h14),0) h14, nvl(sum(h15),0) h15, nvl(sum(h16),0) h16, nvl(sum(h17),0) h17, nvl(sum(h18),0) h18, nvl(sum(h19),0) h19, nvl(sum(h20),0) h20, nvl(sum(h21),0) h21, nvl(sum(h22),0) h22, nvl(sum(h23),0) h23, nvl(sum(h24),0) h24, nvl(sum(h25),0) h25, nvl(sum(h26),0) h26, nvl(sum(h27),0) h27, nvl(sum(h28),0) h28, nvl(sum(h29),0) h29, nvl(sum(h30),0) h30, nvl(sum(h31),0) h31, nvl(sum(h32),0) h32, nvl(sum(h33),0) h33, nvl(sum(h34),0) h34, nvl(sum(h35),0) h35, nvl(sum(h36),0) h36, nvl(sum(h37),0) h37, nvl(sum(h38),0) h38, nvl(sum(h39),0) h39, nvl(sum(h40),0) h40, nvl(sum(h41),0) h41, nvl(sum(h42),0) h42, nvl(sum(h43),0) h43, nvl(sum(h44),0) h44, nvl(sum(h45),0) h45, nvl(sum(h46),0) h46, nvl(sum(h47),0) h47, nvl(sum(h48),0) h48, nvl(sum(h49),0) h49, nvl(sum(h50),0) h50, nvl(sum(h51),0) h51, nvl(sum(h52),0) h52, nvl(sum(h53),0) h53, nvl(sum(h54),0) h54, nvl(sum(h55),0) h55, nvl(sum(h56),0) h56, nvl(sum(h57),0) h57, nvl(sum(h58),0) h58, nvl(sum(h59),0) h59, nvl(sum(h60),0) h60, nvl(sum(h61),0) h61, nvl(sum(h62),0) h62, nvl(sum(h63),0) h63, nvl(sum(h64),0) h64, nvl(sum(h65),0) h65, nvl(sum(h66),0) h66, nvl(sum(h67),0) h67, nvl(sum(h68),0) h68, nvl(sum(h69),0) h69, nvl(sum(h70),0) h70, nvl(sum(h71),0) h71, nvl(sum(h72),0) h72, nvl(sum(h73),0) h73, nvl(sum(h74),0) h74, nvl(sum(h75),0) h75, nvl(sum(h76),0) h76, nvl(sum(h77),0) h77, nvl(sum(h78),0) h78, nvl(sum(h79),0) h79, nvl(sum(h80),0) h80, nvl(sum(h81),0) h81, nvl(sum(h82),0) h82, nvl(sum(h83),0) h83, nvl(sum(h84),0) h84, nvl(sum(h85),0) h85, nvl(sum(h86),0) h86, nvl(sum(h87),0) h87, nvl(sum(h88),0) h88, nvl(sum(h89),0) h89, nvl(sum(h90),0) h90, nvl(sum(h91),0) h91, nvl(sum(h92),0) h92, nvl(sum(h93),0) h93, nvl(sum(h94),0) h94, nvl(sum(h95),0) h95, nvl(sum(h96),0) h96 from dpo_datos96 dat96 join dpo_transformador trafo on dat96.dpodattnfcodi = trafo.dpotnfcodiexcel where dat96.dpodattipocodi = 1 and trafo.dpotnfcodi in ({0}) and dat96.dpodatfecha = to_date('{1}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by trafo.dpotnfcodi, dat96.dpodatfecha

select d.DPODATTNFCODI, b.DPOBARCODIEXCEL, b.DPOBARNOMBRE, b.DPOBARTENSION from dpo_datos96 d, dpo_barra b where DPODATFECHA BETWEEN to_date('{0}', 'DD/Mm/YYYY') and to_date('{1}', 'DD/Mm/YYYY') and b.DPOBARCODIEXCEL = d.dpodatbarcodi GROUP BY d.DPODATTNFCODI, b.DPOBARCODIEXCEL, b.DPOBARNOMBRE, b.DPOBARTENSION
